name: postgrestools
description: Postgres Language Server right in your IDE.

commands.title: Postgres Language Server: Hard Reset (Delete All Temp & Global Binaries)

postgrestools.enabled.description: Whether to enable the PostgresTools extension.

postgrestools.allowDownloadPrereleases.description: Allows selecting prereleases when downloading the binary via this extension

postgrestools.allowVersionChecks.description: If set, the extension will check periodically whether a new version for PostgresTools is available and if so notify the user.

postgrestools.configFile.description: Path to the `postgrestools.jsonc` file. You don't need to set this if the file is on root level of your project.

oneOf.description: Path to the PostgresTools Language Server binary
Platform-specific paths to the PostgresTools Language Server binary
